	<script type='text/javascript'>
		var lpTag = lpTag || {}, lpMTagConfig = lpMTagConfig || {}; lpTag.vars = lpTag.vars  || []; lpTag.dbs = lpTag.dbs || []; lpTag.sdes = lpTag.sdes||[];
		
		(function paramGrabber(){
			var params = window.location.href.split('?')[1];
			var lpSettings = {};

			if (params) {
				params = params.split('&');
			
				for (i = 0; params.length > i; i++) {
					if (params[i].search('buttons') > -1) {
						paramName = params[i].split('=')[0];
						paramValue = params[i].split('=')[1].split(',');
						lpSettings[paramName] = paramValue;
					} else {
						paramName = params[i].split('=')[0];
						paramValue = params[i].split('=')[1];
						lpSettings[paramName] = paramValue;
					}
				}
			}
			
			if (lpSettings.lpsite) {
				lpTag.site = lpSettings.lpsite;
			} else {
				lpTag.site = 60270350;
			}

			if (lpSettings.lpsection) {
				lpTag.section = lpSettings.lpsection;
			}

			if (lpSettings.buttons) {
				for(i = 0; lpSettings.buttons.length > i; i++) {
					var button = document.createElement('div');
					button.id = lpSettings.buttons[i];
					button.style = 'display:none;';
					document.body.appendChild(button);
				}
			}
		})();
		
		window.lpTag=window.lpTag||{},'undefined'==typeof window.lpTag._tagCount?(window.lpTag={wl:lpTag.wl||null,scp:lpTag.scp||null,site:lpTag.site||'',section:lpTag.section||'',tagletSection:lpTag.tagletSection||null,autoStart:lpTag.autoStart!==!1,ovr:lpTag.ovr||{},_v:'1.10.0',_tagCount:1,protocol:'https:',events:{bind:function(t,e,i) {lpTag.defer(function() {lpTag.events.bind(t,e,i)},0)},trigger:function(t,e,i) {lpTag.defer(function() {lpTag.events.trigger(t,e,i)},1)}},defer:function(t,e) {0===e?(this._defB=this._defB||[],this._defB.push(t)):1===e?(this._defT=this._defT||[],this._defT.push(t)):(this._defL=this._defL||[],this._defL.push(t))},load:function(t,e,i) {var n=this;setTimeout(function() {n._load(t,e,i)},0)},_load:function(t,e,i) {var n=t;t||(n=this.protocol+'//'+(this.ovr&&this.ovr.domain?this.ovr.domain:'lptag.liveperson.net')+'/tag/tag.js?site='+this.site);var o=document.createElement('script');o.setAttribute('charset',e?e:'UTF-8'),i&&o.setAttribute('id',i),o.setAttribute('src',n),document.getElementsByTagName('head').item(0).appendChild(o)},init:function() {this._timing=this._timing||{},this._timing.start=(new Date).getTime();var t=this;window.attachEvent?window.attachEvent('onload',function() {t._domReady('domReady')}):(window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',function() {t._domReady('contReady')},!1),window.addEventListener('load',function() {t._domReady('domReady')},!1)),'undefined'===typeof window._lptStop&&this.load()},start:function() {this.autoStart=!0},_domReady:function(t) {this.isDom||(this.isDom=!0,this.events.trigger('LPT','DOM_READY',{t:t})),this._timing[t]=(new Date).getTime()},vars:lpTag.vars||[],dbs:lpTag.dbs||[],ctn:lpTag.ctn||[],sdes:lpTag.sdes||[],hooks:lpTag.hooks||[],identities:lpTag.identities||[],ev:lpTag.ev||[]},lpTag.init()):window.lpTag._tagCount+=1;

		lpTag.iframe = {
			buttonClicked: undefined,
			windowOpened: undefined,
			lpButton: undefined,
			lpReady: undefined,
			lpData: undefined,
			configuration: {
				storageType: undefined,
				mobileDevice: false,
				windowInit: false,
				parentHeight: undefined,
				parentWidth: undefined,
				windowState: undefined,
				lpcurl: undefined,
				lppagename: undefined,
				invite: undefined,

				currentAgent: undefined,
				currentSkill: undefined,
				conversationId: undefined,
                jsllBound: false,
				convInfo: undefined
			}
		}

		lpTag.iframe.adobeAnalyticsLPBindingInit = function() {
			lpTag.external = lpTag.external || {};
			lpTag.external.adobeAnalytics = {
				checkAgent: function (convInfo) {
                    lpTag.iframe.configuration.jsllBound = true;
					
					var updateAWA = function updateAWA() {
						if (convInfo.agentName != undefined && lpTag.iframe.configuration.currentAgent && lpTag.iframe.configuration.currentSkill && lpTag.iframe.configuration.conversationId) {

							var overrideValues = {
								behavior: 21,
								actionType: "A",
								contentTags: {
									"scn": lpTag.iframe.configuration.currentAgent,
									"scnstp": lpTag.iframe.configuration.currentSkill,
									"chtid": lpTag.iframe.configuration.conversationId
								}
							}
								
							if (awa) {
								awa.ct.captureContentPageAction(overrideValues);
							}
						}
					}

					if (convInfo.agentName != undefined && convInfo.agentName != lpTag.iframe.configuration.currentAgent) {
						switch (convInfo.agentName) {
							case 'Microsoft Store':
							case 'Microsoft Sales':
								lpTag.iframe.configuration.currentAgent = 'Greeter Bot';
								break;

							case 'Virtual Agent UAT':
							case 'Virtual Agent DEV':
							case 'Virtual Agent DEV2':
							case 'Virtual Agent STAGE':
							case 'Virtual Agent':
								lpTag.iframe.configuration.currentAgent = 'AI Bot';
								break;

							case 'Microsoft Post Conversation Survey Bot':
								lpTag.iframe.configuration.currentAgent = 'Survey Bot';
								break;
						
							default:
								lpTag.iframe.configuration.currentAgent = 'Human Agent'
								break;
						}

						updateAWA();
					}

					if (convInfo.skill != undefined && convInfo.skill != lpTag.iframe.configuration.currentSkill) {
						lpTag.iframe.configuration.currentSkill = convInfo.skill;
						updateAWA();
					}

					if (convInfo.conversationId != undefined && convInfo.conversationId != lpTag.iframe.configuration.conversationId) {
						lpTag.iframe.configuration.conversationId = convInfo.conversationId;
						updateAWA();
					}
				}
			};

            if (lpTag.iframe.configuration.jsllBound == false) {
                lpTag.events.bind({
                    eventName: 'conversationInfo',
                    appName: 'lpUnifiedWindow',
                    func: lpTag.external.adobeAnalytics.checkAgent
                });
            }
		};

		var receiveMessage = function receiveMessage(msg) {
			if (msg.origin != 'https://va.idp.liveperson.net' && msg.origin != 'https://lpcdn.lpsnmedia.net' && msg.origin != 'https://va.msg.liveperson.net') {
				switch (msg.data.action) {
					case 'init':
						break;

					case 'Checkout':
						lpTag.sdes = lpTag.sdes||[];
						lpTag.sdes.push({
							"type": "purchase",
							"total": msg.data.OrderTotal,
							"orderId": msg.data.OrderId,
							"currency": msg.data.CurrencyCode
						});
						break;

					case 'Topic':
						lpTag.sdes = lpTag.sdes||[];
						lpTag.sdes.push({
							"type": "lead",
							"lead": {"topic": msg.data.Topic}
						});
						break;

					case 'Service':
						lpTag.sdes = lpTag.sdes||[];
						lpTag.sdes.push({
							"type": "service",
							"service": {"topic": msg.data.Service}
						});
						break;

					case 'Congrats':
						lpTag.sdes = lpTag.sdes||[];
						lpTag.sdes.push({
							"type": "purchase",
							"total": msg.data.OrderTotal,
							"orderId": msg.data.OrderId,
							"currency": msg.data.CurrencyCode
						});
						break;

					case 'Cart':
						lpTag.sdes = lpTag.sdes||[];
						lpTag.sdes.push({
							"type": "cart",
							"total": msg.data.Total,
							"currency": msg.data.CurrencyCode
						});
						break;

					case 'parentsize':
						if (typeof msg.data.Width && typeof msg.data.Height) {

							lpTag.iframe.configuration.parentHeight = msg.data.Height;
					
							if (document.getElementsByClassName('lpc_slider')[0] && document.getElementsByClassName('lpc_slider')[0].style.display == 'block') {
								lpTag.iframe.configuration.parentWidth = 800;
							} else if (lpTag.iframe.configuration.parentWidth == undefined || lpTag.iframe.configuration.parentWidth > 400) {
								lpTag.iframe.configuration.parentWidth = 400;
							}

							if (lpTag.iframe.configuration.windowState == 'maximized' && lpTag.iframe.configuration.windowInit) {
								if (lpTag.iframe.configuration.resizing == false || lpTag.iframe.configuration.resizing == undefined) {
									lpTag.iframe.configuration.resizing = true;

									setTimeout(function() {
                                        windowChangeState('maximize');

										lpTag.iframe.configuration.resizing = false;
									}, 250);
								}
							}
						}
						
						break;
					
					case 'open':
						openWindow(msg.data.ButtonId);

						if (lpTag.iframe.configuration.lpcurl) {
							lpTag.sdes = lpTag.sdes||[];
							lpTag.sdes.push({
								"type": "lead",
								"lead": {"leadId": lpTag.iframe.configuration.lpcurl}
							});
						}

						break;

					default:
						break;
				}

				switch (msg.data.invite) {
					case 'accepted':
						var invite = document.querySelectorAll('button[data-lp-event=\'click\']')[0];

						if (invite) {
							invite.click();

							if (lpTag.iframe.configuration.lpcurl) {
								lpTag.sdes = lpTag.sdes||[];
								lpTag.sdes.push({
									"type": "lead",
									"lead": {"leadId": lpTag.iframe.configuration.lpcurl}
								});
							}
						}
						break;
					
					case 'declined':
						var closeButton = document.querySelectorAll('button[data-lp-event=\'close\']')[0];

						if (closeButton) {
							closeButton.click();
						}
						break;
				}

				if (msg.data.lpcurl) {
					lpTag.iframe.configuration.lpcurl = msg.data.lpcurl;

					if (lpTag.iframe.configuration.invite) {
						inviteCheck();
					}
				}

				if (msg.data.lppagename) {
					lpTag.iframe.configuration.lppagename = msg.data.lppagename;

					var config = {
						autoCapture: {
							lineage: true
						},
						coreData: {
							appId: "UniStore",
							pageName: lpTag.iframe.configuration.lppagename
						}
					};

					if (awa) {
						awa.init(config);
					}

					if (lpTag.iframe.configuration.invite) {
						inviteCheck();
					}
				}
			}
		};

		var sendMessage = function sendMessage(msg) {
			window.parent.postMessage(msg, '*');
		};
		
		window.addEventListener('message', receiveMessage, false);

		var windowChangeState = function windowChangeState(state) {
			switch (state) {
				case 'minimize':
                    if (lpTag.iframe.configuration.windowState != 'minimized') {
                        var windowHeight;
                        var windowWidth;

                        if (lpTag.iframe.configuration.mobileDevice) {
                            windowHeight = 0 + 'px';
                            windowWidth = 0 + 'px';
                        } else {
                            windowHeight = 37 + 'px';
                            windowWidth = 400 + 'px';
                        }
                    
                        sendMessage({window:'minimized', height: windowHeight, width: windowWidth});
                        lpTag.iframe.configuration.windowState = 'minimized';
                    }

					break;

                case 'maximize':
                    var windowHeight;
                    var windowWidth;

                    if (lpTag.iframe.configuration.mobileDevice) {
                        if (lpTag.iframe.configuration.parentHeight == undefined || lpTag.iframe.configuration.parentWidth == undefined) {
                            windowHeight = '100vh';
                            windowWidth = '100vw';
                        } else {
                            windowHeight = lpTag.iframe.configuration.parentHeight;
                            windowWidth = lpTag.iframe.configuration.parentWidth;
                        }

                        sendMessage({window:'maximized', height: windowHeight, width: windowWidth});
                    } else {
                        if (lpTag.iframe.configuration.parentHeight == undefined || lpTag.iframe.configuration.parentHeight > 600) {
                            windowHeight = 600;
                        } else if (lpTag.iframe.configuration.parentHeight < 600) {
                            windowHeight = lpTag.iframe.configuration.parentHeight - 35;
                        } else {
                            windowHeight = lpTag.iframe.configuration.parentHeight;
                        }
                        
                        if (lpTag.iframe.configuration.parentWidth == undefined || lpTag.iframe.configuration.parentWidth < 400) {
                            windowWidth = 400;
                        } else {
                            windowWidth = lpTag.iframe.configuration.parentWidth;
                        }

                        sendMessage({window:'maximized', height: windowHeight + 'px', width: windowWidth + 'px'});
                    }
                    
                    lpTag.iframe.configuration.windowState = 'maximized';
                    
                    break;
                
                case 'closed':
				    sendMessage({window:'closed',height:'0px',width:'0px'});	
                    lpTag.iframe.configuration.windowState = 'closed';
					lpTag.iframe.configuration.windowInit = false;

                    break;
			
				default:

					break;
			}
		}

		var windowWatcher = function windowWatcher() {
			if (!lpTag.iframe.configuration.windowInit) {
				const maximizeButton = document.getElementsByClassName('lp_maximized')[0];

				const config = {subtree: false, attributes: true};

				let maximizeObserver = new MutationObserver(function(mutationRecords) {
					mutationRecords.forEach(function(item) {

						var sliderStatus;

						if (item.target.className && item.target.className.search('lp_slider_open') != -1) {
                            lpTag.iframe.configuration.parentWidth = 800;
							sliderStatus = 'open';

                            windowChangeState('maximize');

                            var checkBox = document.getElementById("checkboxVideo");
                            var inviteText = document.getElementsByClassName('lp_cb_invitation_text')[0];
                            inviteText.removeAttribute('role');
                            inviteText.setAttribute('tabindex', 0);

                            if (inviteText && !checkBox ) {
                                inviteText.innerHTML = "I have invited you to a video call. You must be 13 years or older. To start, please select Accept.  <br><br>Microsoft will not record or store the video content of this conversation. To learn more about Microsoft's privacy practices please click <a href='http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=267510&clcid=0x409' target='_blank' aria-label='Privacy Policy'>here</a>. <br><br>" 
                                
                                var submitButton = document.getElementsByClassName('lp_cb_button lp_cb_button_accept');
                                submitButton[0].disabled = true;

                                var myDiv = document.createElement("div");
                                myDiv.setAttribute("class", "checkbox_video");
                                
                                var checkbox= document.createElement("INPUT");
                                checkbox.type = "checkbox";
                                checkbox.id = 'checkboxVideo';
                                checkbox.onchange = function () {
                                    disableButton();
                                };
                                
                                var label = document.createElement('label');
                                label.setAttribute('style', 'color: black; padding-left: 0.9em');
                                label.appendChild(document.createTextNode('I am 13 years or older'));
                                label.setAttribute('for', 'checkboxVideo');
                                
                                myDiv.appendChild(checkbox);
                                myDiv.appendChild(label);

                                inviteText.parentNode.insertBefore(myDiv, inviteText.nextSibling);
                                var videoButtons =  document.getElementsByClassName("lp_cb_offer")[0];
                                
                                videoButtons.childNodes.forEach(function(button) {
                                    button.onclick = function() {
                                        deleteCheckBox(); 
                                    };
                                });

                                inviteText.focus();
                                }
                            } else {
							sliderStatus = 'closed';
						}

						if (item.target.style) {
							if (item.target.style['display'] == 'block' && sliderStatus == 'open') {
                                lpTag.iframe.configuration.parentWidth = 800;
								windowChangeState('maximize');
							} else if (item.target.style['display'] == 'block' && sliderStatus == 'closed') {
                                if (lpTag.iframe.configuration.parentWidth == 800) {
                                    lpTag.iframe.configuration.parentWidth = 400;
                                }
								windowChangeState('maximize');
							} else {
								windowChangeState('minimize');
							}
						}
					});
				});

				maximizeObserver.observe(maximizeButton, config);

				lpTag.iframe.configuration.windowInit = true;
			}
		}

        function disableButton() {
            var checkBox = document.getElementById("checkboxVideo");
            var submitButton = document.getElementsByClassName('lp_cb_button lp_cb_button_accept');
            if (checkBox.checked) {
                submitButton[0].disabled = false;
            } else {
                submitButton[0].disabled = true;
            }
        }

        function deleteCheckBox() {
            var checkBox = document.getElementsByClassName("checkbox_video")[0];
            checkBox.setAttribute('style', 'visibility: hidden')
        }

		var openWindow = function openWindow(ButtonId) {
			if (lpTag.Engagements) {
				if (ButtonId) {
					document.getElementById(ButtonId).firstElementChild.firstElementChild.click();
					windowChangeState('maximize');

					lpTag.iframe.buttonClicked = true;
				} else {
					lpButton = document.getElementsByClassName('LPMcontainer')[0];

					if (lpButton) {
						lpButton.firstChild.click();
						windowChangeState('maximize');
					} else {
						sendMessage({button:'failed',msg:'no button found'});
					}

					lpTag.iframe.buttonClicked = true;
				}
			} else {
				window.lpTag.events.bind('LP_OFFERS', 'OFFER_DISPLAY', function(e) {
					lpTag.Engagements = [];
					lpTag.Engagements.push(e);

					if (e.engagementType === 5 && lpTag.iframe.buttonClicked === undefined) {
						var lpButton;
						lpTag.iframe.buttonClicked = true;
						
						setTimeout(function() {
							lpButton = document.getElementsByClassName('LPMcontainer')[0];
							
							if (lpButton) {
								engagement = lpButton;
							}
							
							engagement.firstChild.click();
						}, 1000);
					}
				});

			}
		}

						showInvite = true;
					}
				});
			}
			
			if (showInvite) {
				sendMessage({invite: 'displayed'});
			}
		}

        var engagementFixCheck = function(lpButton, data) {
            if (typeof engagementFix !== 'undefined') {
                if (lpButton) {
                    lpTag.iframe.lpReady = true;

                    if ((lpTag.iframe.configuration.storageType != undefined) && (lpTag.Engagements != undefined)) {
                        sendMessage({engagement:'buttonReady', name: data.engagementName});
                        
                        return true;
                    } else {
                        return false;
                    }
                } else {
                    return false;
                }
            } else {
                return false;
            }
        }

        setTimeout(function() {
            if (lpTag.taglets.lpSecureStorage.getStorageType()['https://lpcdn.lpsnmedia.net']['monitoringSDK'] == undefined) {
                document.body.innerHTML = '<div style="position:absolute;width:90%;height:90%;opacity:1;z-index:100;background:#fff;text-align: center;font-size: 25px;"></div>';
                sendMessage({engagement:'buttonNotReady'});
                windowChangeState('closed');
			} else if (!lpTag.iframe.windowOpened && !lpTag.iframe.buttonClicked && engagementFixCheck(lpTag.iframe.lpButton, lpTag.iframe.lpData)) {
            }
        }, 20000);

		window.lpTag.events.bind('LP_OFFERS', 'OFFER_IMPRESSION', function(data) {
			if (lpTag.taglets.lpSecureStorage && lpTag.iframe.configuration.storageType == undefined) {
				lpTag.iframe.configuration.storageType = lpTag.taglets.lpSecureStorage.getStorageType()['https://lpcdn.lpsnmedia.net'].lpUnifiedWindow;
            }

			switch (data.engagementType) {
				case 1:
				if (lpTag.iframe.configuration.lpcurl) {
					inviteCheck();
				} else {
					lpTag.iframe.configuration.invite = true;
				}
					
                break;

                case 5:
				case 6:
					lpTag.Engagements = [];
					lpTag.Engagements.push(data);

					var lpButton;

					setTimeout(function() {
						lpButton = document.getElementsByClassName('LPMcontainer')[0];
						lpTag.iframe.lpButton = lpButton;
						lpTag.iframe.lpData = data;
						engagementFixCheck(lpButton, data);
					}, 1000);

					break;
			
				default:
					break;
			}
		});

		lpTag.events.bind('LPTAG', 'ON_STARTED', function(e) {
			lpTag.iframe.configuration.mobileDevice = lpTag.unifiedWindow.DeviceDetector().isMobile();

			lpTag.iframe.adobeAnalyticsLPBindingInit();
			
			if (lpTag.iframe.configuration.mobileDevice) {
				document.getElementsByTagName('style')[0].innerHTML = document.getElementsByTagName('style')[0].innerHTML + ".lp_maximized {height: 100vh !important;width: 100vw !important;}";
			} else {
				document.getElementsByTagName('style')[0].innerHTML = document.getElementsByTagName('style')[0].innerHTML + ".lp_maximized {height: 600px !important;width: 400px !important;}";
			}

			if (typeof lpTag.iframe.lpReady === 'undefined') {
				sendMessage({window:'ready'});
			} else {
				windowChangeState('closed');
			}
		});

		window.lpTag.events.bind('lpUnifiedWindow', 'state', function(data) {
			var currentState = data.state;

			var lpClose = document.getElementsByClassName('lp_close');

			for (i=0; lpClose.length > i; i++) {
				lpClose[i].onclick = function(){

					window.setTimeout(function(){
						var lpWindowVisible = document.getElementById('lpChat');

						if (lpWindowVisible === undefined || lpWindowVisible === null) {
							windowChangeState('closed');
						}
					}, 500);

				}
			}

			if (currentState == 'init') {
				windowWatcher();

				if (!lpTag.iframe.buttonClicked) {
					sendMessage({window:'opened'});
					lpTag.iframe.windowOpened = true;
				}
			} else if (currentState == 'closed') {
				lpTag.iframe.buttonClicked = false;
			}
		});

<!DOCTYPE html>

    <script>
        function getCartItemCountFromCookie() {
            var name = 'cartItemCount=';
            var allCookies = document.cookie.split(';');
            for (var i = 0; i < allCookies.length; i++) {
                var c = allCookies[i];
                while (c.charAt(0) === ' ') {
                    c = c.substring(1);
                }
                if (c.indexOf(name) === 0) {
                    return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
                }
            }
            return 0;
        }

        var count = getCartItemCountFromCookie();

        var parentHost = '';
        var parentOriginProtocol = '';
        var parentOrigin = '';
        try {
            parentHost = parent.location.hostname || '';
            parentOriginProtocol = parent.location.protocol;
            parentOrigin = parent.location.origin;
        } catch {
        }

        if (parentHost && parentOriginProtocol && parentOrigin && parentOriginProtocol.indexOf('https') === 0 && /\.(microsoft|xbox)\.com$/.test(parentHost)) {
            parent.postMessage('DR_Cart_Count=' + count, parentOrigin);
        }
    </script>
</body>
</html>
